thread.title: SIC donates GHC10, 000 to Asogli State
thread.title_full: SIC donates GHC10, 000 to Asogli State

title: SIC donates GHC10, 000 to Asogli State
text:
2 October 2015 08:36 CET SIC donates GHC10, 000 to Asogli State By Myjoyonline.com 
SIC Insurance Company Limited joined the Chiefs and people of Asogli State in the Ho Municipality to celebrate this year’s Asogli State Yam Festival. 
Acting Managing Director of SIC Insurance, Mr. Kwei Mensah Ashidam who led the SIC delegation to pay homage to the Chiefs and people of the festival, lauded the Asogli State for the peaceful celebration of the Yam festival and wished them a good harvest year. 
Mr. Ashidam said the cordial relationship that exists between the company and the Asogli State is the reason the insurer supports the development of education in the area. 
He said SIC’s educational support in Asogli State would impact the development of education in the country as a whole. 
The Premier Insurer donated a cheque of GHC 10,000 to the Asogli Educational Fund and assorted drinks for the celebration of the festival. 
Togbe Afede XIV, Agbogbomefia of Asogli State commended SIC Insurance for their commitment to support the development of the area. 
This year’s Asogli State Yam festival attracted local and foreign visitors some of who donated towards various development initiatives in the
